meanings.definition: The range of knowledge or learning in many different fields.
meanings.sent1: Her polymathies in science, art, and history made her a well-rounded individual.
meanings.sent2: His polymathies allowed him to excel in various subjects at school.
meanings.sent3: With his polymathies, he could probably build a robot that paints masterpieces!
meanings.sent4: Her polymathies were like a colorful palette, blending different areas of expertise seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The library was his playground, where his polymathies shone brightly among the shelves.

meanings.definition: The state of having multiple talents or skills.
meanings.sent1: His polymathies in music, sports, and cooking amazed everyone around him.
meanings.sent2: She showcased her polymathies by effortlessly switching between playing the piano and solving complex equations.
meanings.sent3: His polymathies were so impressive that he could juggle while reciting Shakespeare!
meanings.sent4: In the world of creativity, her polymathies were a symphony of talent and skill.
meanings.sent5: The stage was his canvas, where his polymathies painted a masterpiece of performance.
